value.title: StarCraft 2: MaxPax in Dark Templar PRISON! (Europe Grand Finals)
value.excerpt: Grand Finals of the ESL Open Cup 150 Europe in StarCraft 2. This Protoss versus Protoss between Krystianer and MaxPax has a variety of playstyles, with cheese and macro. Mostly a ton of Stalkers, Disruptors, Zealtos and Dark Templar though.  Support my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lowkotv
